column1: '''The Passing of the Grey Company''' is a song by [[Tolkien metal]] band [[Summoning]]. It appears in their second full-length album [[Minas Morgul (album)|Minas Morgul]]
==Lyrics==
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">
Over the land there lies a long shadow
westward reaching wings of darkness.
The tower trembles
doom aproaches. The dead awaken
for the hour is come for the oathbreakers;
at the stone of Erech they shall stand again
and hear there a horn in the hills ringing.
Whose shall the horn be? Who shall call them
from grey twilight
the heir of him to whom the oath they swore.
From the North shall he come
He shall pass the door to the path of the dead.
On your knees...
The grey company is arriving now...
</poem>
